The text of the resolution is as follows:                                H. Res. 153

Whereas the people of Wichita, Kansas, and the people of       the National Capital Region have experienced a terrible       tragedy with the loss of 67 lives in the crash of American       Eagle Flight…

…thank you very  much for the opportunity to join with you today and throughout a long  process since January 29, earlier this year.

That flight--Flight 5342--originated in Wichita, KS, and, as we know,  on January 29, it collided with an Army Black Hawk helicopter, and it  changed the way we look at air safety every moment since then.

…many people I know, and I rise this evening to recognize and honor the  67 lives we lost, 1 year ago tomorrow, on January 29, 2025.
